FlowDefinition.description: Create a new lead from an unidentified caller with answer\not answer settings - With lead validation Also, we add specific reps that only for their current phone number we will create new Leads. Voicenter does NOT support this flow. Voicenter created the flow but will not support it because it is not apart of Voicenter support service. We offered to help the client create his desired logic but was explained that we can not provide monthly support for this service. Reuven approved it.
FlowDefinition.masterLabel: Voicenter Create New Lead - Not Supported by Voicenter
